name: Google Docs Dark Theme
description:
Tweaked from user 275112's Google Docs Dark UI (https://userstyles.org/styles/120097/google-docs-dark-ui) to be slightly less dark and whatnot.

Only works for Google Docs opened documents.
additional_info:
Adjusted color of background, fixed navigation panel text color, and some more.

Same permission as original author's (Zebouski). You can do whatever you want with this, since I only changed a few things.

Oh and, it turns out that user 345492 was ahead of me in making these tweaks. The adjustments are similar but not exactly the same. Here's their style: https://userstyles.org/styles/130495/google-docs-dark-sepia-mode

Finally, a main page Sepia mode is commented out since the printer actually prints the background color. You can enable it by un-commenting that part, and disable it again when you want to print something.

Update 2017-05-28: Fixed equation toolbar buttons.

discussions.name: Unreadable comment input box with dark GTK theme
